str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Another form for kathezomai; to seat down, i.e. Set; intransitively, to sit; figuratively, to settle.
A year, cycle of time. Prolongation from a primary enos; a year.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To teach, direct, admonish. A prolonged form of a primary verb dao; to teach.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From lego; something said; by implication, a topic, also reasoning or motive; by extension, a computation; specially, the Divine Expression.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
